# Installation

If you want the newest `r badger::badge_devel("rpatin/trophic_sdm_data", "blue")`, you
can install `trophic_sdm_data` from github  with:

```{r, eval=FALSE}
devtools::install_github("rpatin/trophic_sdm_data")
```
